column2: Members seek to increase their autonomy within §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§'s realm.

You want to convert a province, making your religious head happy and showing your piety to the world. Your stewardship will be reduced by two as you're busy helping your court chaplain convert the heathens.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is already well-off, but seeks a true fortune.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to swim in [This.GetHerHis] vault of gold!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to be known to all as a pious man
[This.GetTitledFirstName] seeks to become known for [This.GetObjectPronoun] virtues.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] seeks to become distinguished among the nobility
While already notable, [This.GetTitledFirstName] thinks [This.GetObjectPronoun] deserves true fame and glory for [This.GetHerHis] deeds.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] has no education in the art of personal combat and wants to change that through combat experience.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] has a meager education in the art of personal combat and wants to change that through combat experience.
While [This.GetTitledFirstName] is already well-trained in personal combat, [This.GetSheHe]'d like to take [This.GetHerHis] skills to the next level through experience in the field.

While many already consider [This.GetTitledFirstName] to be one of the more skilled fighters in the realm, [This.GetSheHe] desires true mastery of [This.GetHerHis] art, and no better way to attain such heights exists than through experience in the field.
